duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide professional customer service to both internal and external customers, and collaborate with customers and service center personnel to resolve issues.
Bill shipments pursuant to applicable tariffs and pricing agreements.
Assist customers with inquiries, including tracing shipments, rate quotes, tariff discrepancies, billing, and invoicing questions.
Perform general clerical duties as assigned, including answering and directing phone calls, filing, data entry, and billing.
Process over, short and damaged freight and related documentation for customer resolution.
